reviewText: Good movies each one a little different from one another ,but both are very funny i recomend them if you need a laugh !!!

I can't get enough of this movie. Kicking and Screaming is hilarious! Easily the funniest Will Farrell movie ever. Also probably the best sports movie. Will Farrell works really well the the kids - as well as Mike Ditka (who has a great role). Each kid has his own personality and character, with Byong Sun easily the most adorable. From the coffee addition to Farrell's abuse of rival teams, Kicking and Screaming will leave you screaming for more. I'd give it 6 stars if possible!

Love these movies & love it even more that it's on one disk.
Came in a single disc package. But I had a spare empty dual movie pack. Great movies!
best soccer movie of all timegrea
Two hilarious movies for such a low price! How can you go wrong?

Even though I already had Kicking and Screaming DVD (by itself), this was one of the only ways to get Big Fat Liar at the price I was willing to spend.
Both movies work fine but the case has a crack on the spine (hence the dropping of one star).
Overall, very satisfied with the purchase.
Lance
The movies are both really great! They Really worth the money for this deal and they are in new condition!
Our kids loved these movies - they could not stop laughing!  Fun family movies that are appropriate for all ages.  Great combo
